LanguageData.VWE_TrenchWarfare.label: trench warfare
LanguageData.VWE_TrenchWarfare.description: Adapt a trench warfare doctrine with a selection of weapons for close-quarters combat.
LanguageData.VWE_TrenchWarfare.generalRules.rulesStri: subject_story->adopted age-old strategies to modern combat, ensuring survival
subject_story->innovated in close-quarters battle tactics within the trenches
subject_story->engineered fortifications that blend with the landscape for surprise attacks
subject_story->developed communication lines within trenches to coordinate assaults
subject_gerund->fortifying positions with strategic ingenuity in warfare
LanguageData.VWE_HeavyWeapons.label: heavy weapons
LanguageData.VWE_HeavyWeapons.description: Construct heavy weapons that offer superior firepower, at the cost of being very physically demanding.
LanguageData.VWE_HeavyWeapons.generalRules.rulesStrin: subject_story->developed weapons that bring unparalleled firepower to the battlefield
subject_story->balanced the scales of warfare with heavy, decisive armaments
subject_story->created training programs for specialized units to operate these weapons
subject_story->engineered mobility solutions to transport and deploy heavy armaments
subject_gerund->mastering the art of destruction with heavy weapons
LanguageData.VWE_LaserTargetingSystems.label: laser targeting systems
LanguageData.VWE_LaserTargetingSystems.description: Adapt laser targeting systems for accurate and swift delivery of charged payloads.
LanguageData.VWE_LaserTargetingSystems.generalRules.r: subject_story->revolutionized precision strikes with advanced laser guidance
subject_story->enabled real-time target acquisition and adjustment
subject_story->integrated systems with existing weaponry for enhanced combat effectiveness
subject_story->developed compact, portable laser designators for field operations
subject_gerund->honing the edge of warfare with technology
